alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Monroe and southeastern Lenawee Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Milan to near Dundee to 7 miles southwest of Blissfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Milan, Dundee and Petersburg around 240 PM EDT. Ida around 245 PM EDT. Maybee around 250 PM EDT. Ottawa Lake around 300 PM EDT. Monroe and Carleton around 305 PM EDT. Flat Rock, Temperance and Lambertville around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Newport, Estral Beach, Ogden Center, Toledo Beach, Erie, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Bolles Harbor and Samaria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
